body.name: Hanes womens Organic Cotton Panties Hipsters Pack Of 6
features: GO ORGANIC - Organic cotton hipsters are made with 40% less dyes, something to feel good about.
COMFORT AT THE WAIST - A ComfortSoft waistband is kind to your skin and moves without pinching or binding.
HYBRID HIPSTER SILO - A low-rise waist with moderate back coverage that sits right at the hips.
NO-RIDE, NO-WORRY LEG BANDS - Dreamy comfort at the leg openings.
TAG FREE, ITCH FREE - No scratchy tag to bunch up or itch.
STOCK-UP 6-PACK - Replenish your underwear drawer in an instant.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: About Us HanesBrands makes everyday apparel that is known and loved by consumers around the world for comfort, quality and value. Among the company’s iconic brands are Hanes, the basic apparel brand in the United States; Champion, an innovator at the intersection of lifestyle and athletic apparel; and Bonds, which is setting new standards for design and sustainability. We are committed to making the world a more comfortable, livable place. We have established new, wide-ranging global goals and designed to increase our transparency on key metrics. We approach sustainability from a broad, holistic perspective and focus our efforts in all areas.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect material, but take care of size
reviews.reviewText: Actually it's perfect and excellent finish, very soft and comfortable. But size is big for me , inspite of reviewing size chart. Do it's better to take one or two numbers less than your size.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I went up a size (size 7)after reading reviews and was happy I did. They do shrink when washed. After the first washing they fit me perfectly. I've since purchased another package. Comfortable waistband about 1" wide. Doesn't roll! The elastic is completely covered by the fabric. No elastic pinching my skin!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice Underpants, but They Run Small
reviews.reviewText: I like that these panties are 100% cotton and have thick, covered elastic around the waist and comfortable elastic around the legs. They seem to be well sewn and high quality both In materials and workmanship. The colors are calming and I love the ditzy print on the two pair of print undies. If you can, order a size or two larger than you usually take. I usually get a size smaller than I ordered, but I wanted underpants that were a little roomier because I am not as active as I used to be. These feel small compared to the one-size-smaller size I usually wear. They are also 100% cotton, so expect them to shrink a little. I will wash these in cold water and line dry them. Maybe they will stretch a bit with wear. Overall, though I’m pretty happy with these and think they are worth the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: These panties are more comfortable than men's underwear and I also use them as diaper covers, as I'man adult baby. However, without diapers, the panties are a little big (being a man, I forgot that size9 is a plus size for women). The soft, warm cotton and feminine colors satisfy my desire for femininediaper covers and an alternative to uncomfortable men's underwear.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Wanted to love but just like
reviews.reviewText: Finding organic cotton underwear at a reasonable price is so challenging so I wanted to really love them. The overall fit just seems off to me. I'm 5'6 115lbs and got the medium which are really snug around the thighs/crotch area. The waist is fine. But do not love them enough to purchase again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 4, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I have been buying the same size and style of Hanes underwear for years. They have always fit and have been comfortable. Unfortunately they are rarely in stock in my preferred style and size at my local big box store, so I decided to order on Amazon. I was so thrilled to find them in organic cotton. Who really wants all the cotton pesticides and questionable dyes on their private bits anyway. So, I happily ordered the same style and size that I always have. The 5 pack shipped on time, delivered on time, and after opening, I put all into the laundry. Now, I am pretty particular about my clothes and I was everything on delicate and hang dry, because I want to extend the life of ALL my clothing. Anyway, I put a pair on this morning and OMG. I don't understand if Hanes decided to cut these smaller to save on cost because, it's organic cotton and they are trying to keep cost down by making these smaller or if Hanes changed their sizing, but these are NOT the same as the conventional cotton size and style that I own. This is seriously pathetic to see another big company trying to make a profit on something that all people are entitled to- clean. good for you, non toxic goods. I will not be purchasing from Hanes again. It's so annoying for businesses to do this to the people. Done with it. I highly recommend you giving other brands the business and not these companies who try to pull the wool over our eyes by using trends to lure you in. BTW, these underwear are overall smaller- the rise is shorter, the fabric width is cut smaller, there is overall much less fabric than their conventional counterparts and these "organic " version runs at least a size smaller than their regular version.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Go a size bigger
reviews.reviewText: I usually am a small, but Amazon recommended a medium, so I got the medium. When they came, they looked huge, but these shrunk with the first wash and fit me perfectly after! They have not shrunk more after other washes.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars No other panty works for ME!!
reviews.reviewText: So hooked to the comfort n quality! I have tried other brands but hardly anyone has 100% cotton. They last really long.
Fits small size up 1 to 2 sizes as they shrink as well. Great quality, would purchase again.
Low rise hipster not so much. High rise, ruched granny panties is what I got. Not to mention in the complete wrong colours and size as well. Had to send back for refund.

I'm not sure what is up with Hanes lately? Package came labelled as hipster but fits more like a bikini and picture on website of patterns in package was not what was received - totally different. What a waste of money.
